summary: The class generates LaTeX source that visualizes quantum circuits using the Q‑circuit package. It assembles the circuit layout, inserts gates, controls, measurements, barriers and other elements, manages array dimensions and formatting, and outputs a ready‑to‑compile LaTeX string.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to automatically convert quantum circuit specifications (e.g., from Qiskit) into high‑quality LaTeX diagrams for documentation, papers, and presentation slides.
